name: Apo K'Lypse IV 2
description:
While you were going through a long journey aboard your space ship, you crashed on a wonderful planet. Recently, meteors started to fall endlessly. You have tried everything so far, you even constructed an ice station to cool the planet, but there is nothing to be done. It’s a tragic decision for you, who loved this new place, but now it’s an emergency. You HAVE to leave, and you know that you won’t be able to save the planet.

Your spaceship contains everything you need to get repaired, now you have to collect the last materials to finally escape the planet.
